byline.original: By HILARIE M. SHEETS, GRAHAM BOWLEY and BRETT SOKOL

abstract: Inside Art column; Chelsea gallery Mitchell-Innes & Nash plans 2016 exhibit of works by Pop artist Tom Wesselmann from his 1960s Great American Nude series; Phillips schedules auction of 200 works from Fredric Brandt estate; Printed Matter holds annual NY Art Book Fair September 2015 at MoMA PS1 in Long Island City.
lead_paragraph: Mitchell-Innes & Nash will present the first survey of Wesselmann paintings in New York since his death in 2004; contemporary works collected by the celebrity dermatologist Fredric Brandt go up for auction.

headline.main: Tom Wesselmann Nudes, and the Collection of the ‘Baron of Botox’
headline.print_headline: Tom Wesselmann Nudes, and the Collection of the ‘Baron of Botox’

snippet: Mitchell-Innes & Nash will present the first survey of Wesselmann paintings in New York since his death in 2004; contemporary works collected by the celebrity dermatologist Fredric Brandt go up for auction.
